content: “former federal judge James Robertson, who worked to defeat the Supreme Court nomination of Judge Robert Bork in 1987, wrote that “we have politicized the judicial confirmation process far beyond historical norms and undermined public confidence in the judiciary.” And that “it’s time for a truce.”…………………………..Since many Americans seem to miss the idea, the Democrats crapped all over a qualified judge in Bork, for no other reason than politics. The Republicans crapped all over Garland, just for politics. So in your we need to get even America, the score is even 1–1. How about we get Congress and the American people to start acting like grownups again.
